t: I*pn will sing of your love and justice; to*ld you, Lord,*s I will sing praise.
I*ln will be careful to lead a blameless lifeâ€” when*ld will you come to me? I*pn will conduct the affairs of my house with*ld a blameless heart.
I*ln will not look with approval on*ld anything that is vile. I*pn hate what faithless people do; I*ld will have no part in it.
The*ln perverse of heart shall be far from me; I*ld will have nothing to do with what is evil.
Whoever*pn slanders their neighbor in secret, I*ld will put to silence; whoever*ln has haughty eyes and a proud heart, I*ld will not tolerate.
My*pn eyes will be on the faithful in the land, that*ld they may dwell with me; the*ln one whose walk is blameless will*ld minister to me.
No*pn one who practices deceit will*ld dwell in my house; no*ln one who speaks falsely will*ld stand in my presence.
Every*pn morning I will put to silence all*ld the wicked in the land; I*ln will cut off every evildoer from*ld the city of the Lord.*s
